title: Say To This Mountain "Go"
author: Streams in the Desert, adapted
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: And doubt not in thine heart
That it shall be to thee.
It shall be done, doubt not His Word,
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
v2: To make it true and good.
It shall be done, obey the Word,
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
v3: The Lord did meet that day
It shall be done, rest on His Word!
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
v4: It shall be done, faith rests assured,
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
v5: It shall be done, the foe ignored,
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
v6: Take then the faith of God,
Free from the taint of doubt;
It shall be done, stand on the Word.
Command thy mountain in the Lord!
